summary: Hospitality Suite (S2-S5) testing completed successfully. All 6 API endpoints working correctly with expected demo data. All 6 UI pages load and function properly with filters, navigation, and action buttons (check-in/check-out, start/complete tasks, view folio details).
critical_code_review_comments: MOCKED: All hospitality service implementations (room-service.ts, reservation-service.ts, guest-service.ts, housekeeping-service.ts, folio-service.ts) use in-memory storage - not connected to real database
Demo data is well-structured with 12 rooms, 8 guests, 6 reservations, 6 housekeeping tasks, 3 folios for 'PalmView Suites, Lekki' demo hotel
All API endpoints follow consistent patterns with proper filtering, pagination, and stats
UI pages have proper data-testid attributes for testing
Check-in/check-out and housekeeping start/complete actions work correctly and update state in real-time

success_rate.frontend: 100% (6/6 pages load correctly, all interactions work)

seed_data_creation: None - uses demo data from in-memory services
context_for_next_testing_agent: Hospitality Suite is fully functional with demo data. All 6 API endpoints work without authentication. Demo hotel is 'PalmView Suites, Lekki' with Nigerian hospitality context (NGN currency, Nigerian phone numbers). Services use in-memory storage following same pattern as Civic, Education, and Health suites.

frontend_pages: /hospitality/admin - Dashboard with stats (45% occupancy, 6 in-house, rooms/reservations/guests/housekeeping/folios modules, quick actions)
/hospitality/rooms - Room grid with 12 rooms, filters (type/occupancy/cleaning), status badges, guest names
/hospitality/reservations - Table with 6 reservations, check-in/check-out buttons, status filter, revenue display
/hospitality/guests - Table with 8 guests, search, type/loyalty filters, loyalty tier badges, blacklist status
/hospitality/housekeeping - Table with 6 tasks, start/complete buttons, status/priority filters, assigned staff
/hospitality/folios - Table with 3 folios, view details dialog with transactions, balance display
ui_interactions: Check-in button - Changes reservation status to CHECKED_IN (PASSED)
Check-out button - Changes reservation status to CHECKED_OUT (PASSED)
Start task button - Changes task status to IN_PROGRESS (PASSED)
Complete task button - Changes task status to COMPLETED (PASSED)
View folio button - Opens dialog with charges/payments/balance (PASSED)

mocked_apis_note: MOCKED: All hospitality service implementations use in-memory storage and return demo/stub data. This is intentional as the services follow the same pattern as Civic, Education, and Health suites. Data resets on page refresh.
